now.work: I’m taking a bit of time out at the moment to reflect on the past 7 years at Clearleft and think about what I might want to do next. I’m really curious about the sustainable and regenerative space and making some small steps toward it.
now.pleasure: I’ve been admiring the ephemeral beauty of Sakura in and around Lewes. Our trip to Japan last year has bought new meaning to this time of year and it has become a memory portal to the beautiful country I so wish to return to. I’ve also started swimming again at Pells Pool, the ~14° water temperature has been a welcome shock to the system.
